replies.author: fortomxq
replies.txt_content:
sjjklh 发表于 2013-5-14 13:16 
请在命令行执行ping www.mcbbs.net，结果如何？
ping到的地址一直在变，之前是101开头的浙江地区，现在成了dnspod-free.urlpod.cn 54.248.39.145。
好像论坛是遭到DNS劫持攻击了，修改host 61.147.108.153后正常访问……

replies.author: sjjklh
replies.txt_content:
fortomxq 发表于 2013-5-14 13:19

replies.txt_content:

1234kobe 发表于 2013-5-14 13:29

replies.author: fortomxq
replies.txt_content:

OK，正常了，ping 101.71.245.14

replies.txt_content:
